subject: Special offer
body:
Dear customer.
Is it safe to shop for drugs on the Web? How to save some money on the medications you use? In what ways are Canadian drugs better than American ones? Get answers to all these questions now.
At CanadianPharmacy you will always be able to find the generic drugs you need and they will be a lot cheaper that those sold in the USA. CanadianPharmacy is a licensed Canadian e-shop, which lets it (and you too) turn the Canadian drug taxation system to its advantage.
CanadianPharmacy no one is able to match our prices for generic medications neither in Canada nor in the USA.
Sincerely yours,Kristy Horton
